author: Universal Pictures
description:
After successfully stealing every gift and decoration from Whoville, the Grinch (Jim Carrey) listens from the top of Mount Crumpit to hear the Whos singing, realizing the true meaning of Christmas. 

Buy/Rent How the Grinch Stole Christmas!
